::KitKat::

 Megatron called her darling. It sent shivers up her spine.
"No....The Allience will aid the maximals. Right now,the maximals are 
week, but getting aid. The Allience is what truely stands in the way 
of the downfall of the maximals. Crush the Allience and the maximals 
will fall even faster."
She took a step back. She looked down at her wrist. "I saw that you 
had a bot with you.  I didn't realize it was Aracnia. I'm having the 
converation recorded. Just as insurance in case anything happens to 
me." She smiled at Megatron, keeping her cool. She wasn't going to 
tell him that Destructor could have been listening this whole 
time.  "Also, with a treaty,it is only temarary.  A council will be 
long standing.  WE can all go our separate ways, but we will need the 
council incase of events that may take place in the future. With the 
council, the Predacons will be assured of continued rain over this 
planet."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron looks to Kitkat, "I suggest a treaty with the 
Allience. Our 
> might would crush the Maximals, and stamp out all the other 
disgusting little 
> groups that pain us. Then, after all is settled.....we simply end 
the 
> agreement and go about on our own agenda. And if it happens to be 
the 
> destruction of the Allience, so be it. After all....I dont think it 
would be 
> any sooner than a few months until the Maximals are on the decline."
>     He looked at her wrist. There, blinking silently, was her 
commlink. Why 
> was it blinking? What was the little doggie up to? "Um, darling, 
pray tell 
> what is that blinking light on your commlink signify?" He said, 
gazing closer.
